detectors.description:

	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlayDapp.sol#60)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlayDapp.sol#61)
